title: When Interest Rates Turn the Corner
sub_head: Forty years ago marked the start of a bull  market in bonds that would last for decades. No one saw it coming.
body:
Have I got a deal for you.
You can buy mortgage bonds priced to yield 17.85% over the next 10 years or 18.75% over the next 20 years. Theyâ€™re investment grade, not junk bonds.
